text:
I just love how real Posty is. He's just a dude making music he loves, and he's clearly grateful every day to be doing it, and he still likes hanging out with just regular folks. Dude's always the same genuine guy in every arena I see him in - playing in actual arenas, streaming Apex Legends, playing metal with the homies, hanging in the tour bus, chatting with folks, and just being so real. 

He's always complimentary of others and just gives away the spotlight all the time. He's got to be one of the most naturally charismatic dudes in the world and I really just genuinely appreciate him and his candor in the world today. 

Keep it up Austin.
